description: Immutable constants and tiered operational thresholds required by Axiom Finality Systems (P-01) and Generative Synthesis Engine (GSEP-C L7). Structured for semantic integrity and optimized retrieval.

TAU_NORMALIZATION_FACTOR.purpose: Normalization factor ensuring computational stability and establishing minimum risk floor (preventing division by zero).

P01_VIABLE_SAFETY_MARGIN.purpose: The minimum required viable safety margin buffer required for P-01 Finality Certification.

COF_AXIOM_HALT_DEVIATION.purpose: Maximum permitted divergence in Core Optimization Function (COF) stability checks.

GSEP_MAX_COMPUTATIONAL_CYCLES.action: Trigger Resource Exhaustion Fail-Safe and rollback.
GSEP_MAX_COMPUTATIONAL_CYCLES.purpose: Hard limit on iterative cycles within GSEP-C V3.5 Layer L7 computation.

P01_LOW_CONFIDENCE_WARNING.action: Generate Persistent Audit Warning Log (Allows operation under monitoring).
P01_LOW_CONFIDENCE_WARNING.purpose: Alert when P-01 finality confidence drops below stringent monitoring level.
